author: feedback@businessinsider.com (Brett Bruen), Brett Bruen
title: The coronavirus exposed Trump's 'America First' doctrine for the terrible idea it is
description: AP Photo/Evan Vucci President Donald Trump's "America First" policies have riled his base. They have also harmed the United States' standing on the global stage, which the coronavirus epidemic has revealed. As a result, the US may come last in the fight again…
content:
Business Insider
America First is suffering during the COVID-19 pandemic.  Introduced during President Trump's [sic; full name on first reference] inaugural address, this supremely selfish worldview has formed the centerpiece of his foreign policy.
